td.b: Final Weight of the Specimen after Oven Dry kg

th.span: Limit as Per IS : IS 2185 Part-1 : 2005

tr.t-if: data.block_density_visible and (data.block_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.block_density_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.moisture_movment_visible and (data.moisture_movment_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.moisture_movment_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.drying_shrinkage_visible and (data.drying_shrinkage_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.drying_shrinkage_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.water_absorption_visible and (data.water_absorption_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.water_absorption_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.compressive_visible and (data.compressive_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.compressive_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
